tvestergaard.fog.data.customers

Interface CustomerDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MysqlCustomerDAO

    public interface CustomerDAO

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void confirmMembership(int token)
      Confirms the membership confirmation challenge of the provided token.
      Customer create(CustomerBlueprint blueprint)
      Inserts a new customer into the data storage.
      Customer first(Constraints<CustomerColumn> constraints)
      Returns the first customer matching the provided constraints.
      java.util.List<Customer> get(Constraints<CustomerColumn> constraints)
      Returns the customers in the data storage.
      void resetPassword(int tokenId, java.lang.String newPassword)
      Resets the password of the customer the provided token was issued to.
      boolean update(CustomerUpdater updater)
      Updates the entity in the data storage to match the provided customer.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        java.util.List<Customer> get(Constraints<CustomerColumn> constraints)
                      throws DataAccessException
        Returns the customers in the data storage. The results can be constrained using the provided constraints.
        Parameters:
        constraints - The constraints that modify the resulting list.
        Returns:
        The resulting customers.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - When a data storage exception occurs while performing the operation.

      • first

        Customer first(Constraints<CustomerColumn> constraints)
        throws DataAccessException
        Returns the first customer matching the provided constraints.
        Parameters:
        constraints - The constraints that modify the resulting list.
        Returns:
        The first customer matching the provided constraints. Returns null when no constraints matches the provided constraints.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - When a data storage exception occurs while performing the operation.

      • create

        Customer create(CustomerBlueprint blueprint)
         throws DataAccessException
        Inserts a new customer into the data storage.
        Parameters:
        blueprint - The cladding blueprint that contains the information necessary to create the cladding.
        Returns:
        The customer instance representing the newly created customer.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - When a data storage exception occurs while performing the operation.

      • update

        boolean update(CustomerUpdater updater)
        throws DataAccessException
        Updates the entity in the data storage to match the provided customer.
        Parameters:
        updater - The cladding updater that contains the information necessary to create the cladding.
        Returns:
        true if the record was updated.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - When a data storage exception occurs while performing the operation.

      • resetPassword

        void resetPassword(int tokenId,
                   java.lang.String newPassword)
            throws DataAccessException
        Resets the password of the customer the provided token was issued to. The token is then deleted.
        Parameters:
        tokenId - The token identifying the customer to reset the password of.
        newPassword - The new password.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - When a data storage exception occurs while performing the operation.

      • confirmMembership

        void confirmMembership(int token)
                throws DataAccessException
        Confirms the membership confirmation challenge of the provided token.
        Parameters:
        token - The id of the token to confirm.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - When a data storage exception occurs while performing the operation.
